languages.text: Живое плодоносящее древо в сердце города-улья — необыкновенное зрелище. Скорее всего, на уход за этим растением тратится куда больше воды, чем может рассчитывать в своем пайке рядовой житель Даргонуса.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Живое дерево с плодами в мире-улье, показывает богаство и роскошь

languages.text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.
languages.original_text: Живое плодоносящее древо в сердце города-улья — необыкновенное зрелище. Скорее всего, на уход за этим растением тратится куда больше воды, чем может рассчитывать в своем пайке рядовой житель Даргонуса.

traits.locale_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than an average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their everyday ration.

A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than an average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their everyday ration.

A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

languages.text: 巢都世界的中心地区生长着一棵有生命的、能结出果实的树，实在是无比奇妙的景象。用来浇这棵树的水，很可能比普通达戈努斯公民的日常配给用水还要多。
languages.original_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

traits.locale_text: 巢都世界的中心地区生长着一棵有生命的、能结出果实的树，实在是无比奇妙的景象。用来浇这棵树的水，很可能比普通达戈努斯公民的日常配给用水还要多。

languages.text: Un árbol vivo dando fruto en el corazón de un mundo colmena es un espectáculo de fantasía. Probablemente se gaste más agua en el riego de este árbol de la que puede esperar recibir el ciudadano medio de Dargonus en todo un día.
languages.original_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

traits.locale_text: Un árbol vivo dando fruto en el corazón de un mundo colmena es un espectáculo de fantasía. Probablemente se gaste más agua en el riego de este árbol de la que puede esperar recibir el ciudadano medio de Dargonus en todo un día.

languages.text: 過密惑星の中心で、実のなる生きた木を見るのはとても幻想的だ。この木を世話するために、ダルゴナスの平均的な市民がもらえる1日分の配給よりも多くの水が使われているに違いない。
languages.original_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

traits.locale_text: 過密惑星の中心で、実のなる生きた木を見るのはとても幻想的だ。この木を世話するために、ダルゴナスの平均的な市民がもらえる1日分の配給よりも多くの水が使われているに違いない。

languages.text: Ein lebender, Früchte tragender Baum im Herzen einer Makropolwelt ist ein fantastischer Anblick. Dieser Baum erhält wahrscheinlich jeden Tag deutlich mehr Wasser als der Durchschnittsbürger von Dargonus.
languages.original_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

traits.locale_text: Ein lebender, Früchte tragender Baum im Herzen einer Makropolwelt ist ein fantastischer Anblick. Dieser Baum erhält wahrscheinlich jeden Tag deutlich mehr Wasser als der Durchschnittsbürger von Dargonus.

languages.text: Rien n'est plus surprenant que de voir un arbre fruitier au plein cœur d'un monde ruche. Il requiert très probablement plus d'eau au quotidien que ce qui est accordé à un habitant de Dargonus ordinaire.
languages.original_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

traits.locale_text: Rien n'est plus surprenant que de voir un arbre fruitier au plein cœur d'un monde ruche. Il requiert très probablement plus d'eau au quotidien que ce qui est accordé à un habitant de Dargonus ordinaire.

languages.text: Bir kovan dünyanın kalbinde yaşayan ve meyve veren ağaç, gerçekten de büyülü bir manzara. Bu ağacı beslemek için muhtemelen ortalama bir Dargonus vatandaşının günlük hakkı olan sudan çok daha fazlası kullanılıyordur.
languages.original_text: A living, fruit-bearing tree in the heart of a hive world is a fantastical sight. They probably use a lot more water to tend to this tree than the average Dargonus citizen can hope to receive in their daily ration.

traits.locale_text: Bir kovan dünyanın kalbinde yaşayan ve meyve veren ağaç büyülü bir manzara gerçekten de. Bu ağacı beslemek için muhtemelen ortalama bir Dargonus vatandaşının günlük elde edebileceği sudan çok daha fazlası kullanılıyordur.
